notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by the National Institute for Health Research (NIHR) Global Health Research Unit on NTDs at BSMS using UK aid from the UK Government to support global health research. NIHR was not involved in the design of the study, collection, analysis, interpretation of data and in writing the manuscript. The views expressed in this publication are those of the author (s) and not necessarily those of the NIHR or the UK Department for Health and Social Care.
